text: Serge Grouard (born 19 March 1959 in Paris) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented Loiret's 2nd constituency from 2002 to 2017, as a member of The Republicans. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paris Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Gaullism, a way forward for France Category:Mayors of Orléans Category:Sciences Po alumni Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Serge Grouard
